bio.heading: Who is Abhishek?
description: Back in 2020, I decided to try my hand at using Linux systems mainly kali but also had tried many distros and developed a keen sense of  in the field of cybersecurity

Fast forward to today, I've built projects related to machine learning and C ,C++ projects a a part of my educational projects and even my own startup Abhishek Enterprise with focus on fast, elegant and user friendly experiences for the market of Nepal and their use of technology
When I'm not coding, I'm regularly writing poems and watch anime.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
experience.description: As new to this technological community I frist handedly explored the web technology communtiy and  got a chance to have basic and minor skills of react as well as next tailwind typescript and diffrent frameworks.

experience.title: CEO
experience.description: I started this idea  as an aim to create something I will be proud of in the future. Its is not an ofiicialy registered Company but will soon touch the peak of sucess and make my dream possible.

education.description: The course compromised of the steps of me becoming what I want to be and a full pathway towards my dream job and Company.
Currently pursuing the Bachelors degree to tackle the real life market and compete in the saturated market for showcasing my skills and a developed sense of competition.
A journey from Grade 10  to Grade 12 with clearing high school ready to takle the diffrent technologies and graduated from this institute with a GPA of 3.75
A journey from Pre-school to the grade 10 with a huge interest in wielding knowledge and graduated from this institute with a GPA of 4.0
